issue.title: [CF 512] the paladin ability that stacks off of shield of the r
issue.body:
[G] <85:Midnightrun>: cyb, add the paladin ability that stacks off of shield of the r, it stacks to like 5 and each stack makes next word of glory higher %
[G] <85:Midnightrun>: that needs to be in TMW
[G] <Away><85:Cybeloras>: k

Your wish is my command.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #512 | Raw

comments.body:
Bastion of Glory. Its just a buff.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
